dt-example.title: Click to move buttons
dt-example.info:
In the [previous example](./dragButton.html) we saw `-content reorder` being used to allow mouse click and drag reordering of buttons. You might also wish to provide the end user with a simple button to change the column order - that can be done with `-content reorderLeft` and `-content reorderRight`.
This example demonstrates that ability with the column reordering buttons in a dropdown.
